short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We help you to place bid on eBay at the last seconds via JustSnipe.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is eBay auction sniper that helps you to place bid at the last moment before the auction on eBay ends. With our software application and powerful servers, you can setup the target items at any time and it will just snipe them for you. 

This extension is a browser extension from our online web service at http://justsnipe.com 

You will need to register at JustSnipe.com in order to use it. 


************ 
Version: 1.9.4
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.
